sentences.sContent: I was still striving to be successful.
We must continue to strive for greater efficiency.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须继续为提高效率而努力。

sentences.sContent: ...Young people should have lofty ideals in life and strive to be leaders...
...a business or a country should strive to build a corporate culture or a social climate that values innovation...
...China will strive to ensure that by 2015 employees receive an average of 13...

remMethod.val: s ＋ trive(看作drive， 动力) → 奋斗需要动力 → 奋斗

words.tran: 努力（strive的现在分词）；奋斗；力争

trans.tranOther: to make a great effort to achieve something
